GMA Format

Notes

  • There can be empty entries without data or a name.
  • Model names are null ('\0') terminated without any alignment.
  • The model name base position is right after the model/name offset list.
  • The transformation matrix is a 3 x 4 (row major) matrix of 12 floats
  • The model header size is aligned to 0x20 bytes
  • The Model occurs directly after the Model Header
  • Note mesh headers are determined to be in layer 1 or layer 2 based on when they appear. I there are 4 layer 1 meshes, then the first 4 mesh header will be for layer 1.
  • Note The Model Type 1 is aligned to 0x20 bytes after the Unknown 8 Type 2s.
  • Note The number of non-indexed strips isn't written anywhere. You know you're finished once you reach its size and is aligned to 0x20 bytes after.

Sections

  • File Header
  • Model Header
  • Model Type 1 (Skin Model or Effective Model only)
  • Model Type 2 (16Bit or Stitching Model only)
  • Model Entry
  • Material
  • Transformation Matrix
  • Mesh Header
  • Vertex Pool (Indexed Data)
  • Type 8 Unknown 1 (Not in SMB?)
  • Type 8 Unknown 2 (Not in SMB?)
  • Mesh Data (Indexed Data)
  • Strip Header (Indexed Data)
  • Strip Data (Indexed Data)
  • Non-indexedMesh Data (Non-indexed Data)
  • Strip Header (Non-indexed Data)
  • Strip Data (Non-indexed Data)

Flags

  • Ok to be left as null
  • Ok to be left as null if the number of objects is 0/referenced item is not set
  • 4 byte integer
  • 4 byte float
  • 2 byte short
  • 1 byte
  • 4 byte file offset
  • 4 byte RGBA Color
  • Unknown

File Header

Length: 0x10/16

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44Number of objects
0x440x44Model Base position
0x880x88List Model Entries (one for each model)

Model Header

Length: 0x90/144

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44The ascii GCMF
0x440x44Section flags (16Bit: 0x01; Stitching Model: 0x04; Skin Model: 0x08; Effective Model: 0x10)
0x880x44X center for bounding sphere
0xC120x44Y center for bounding sphere
0x10160x44Z center for bounding sphere
0x14200x44Bounding sphere radius
0x18240x22Number of materials
0x1A260x22Number of layer 1 meshes
0x1C280x22Number of layer 2 meshes
0x1E300x11Transformation matrix count
0x1F310x11Zero (check byte)
0x20320x44Header size
0x24360x44Zero (check byte)
0x28400x88Transformation matrix defaults indexes (8 separate bytes)
0x30480x44Zero (check bytes)
0x34520x44Zero (check bytes)
0x38560x44Zero (check bytes)
0x3C600x44Zero (check bytes)
0x40640x2032List Materials (One for each material)
0x60960x3048List Transformation Matrices (One for each Transformation Matrix)
0x901440x00Model (Type 1 or Type 2)

Model Type 1 (Skin Model or Effective Model only)

Length: 0x20/32

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44Number of vertices
0x440x44Offet Part Type 8 Unknown 1
0x880x44Offet Part Vertex Pool (Relative offset from start of model to after The Mesh Headers ie: where the Vertex Pool starts)
0xC120x44Offet Part Mesh Data (Relative offset from the start of the model to after the Unknown 8 Types ie: where the Mesh Data starts)
0x10160x44Offet Part Type 8 Unknown 2
0x14200x44Zero (check bytes)
0x18240x44Zero (check bytes)
0x1C280x44Zero (check bytes)
0x20320x00List Mesh Headers (One for each mesh header)
0x20320x00List Vertex Pool (One for each vertex)
0x20320x00List Type 8 Unknown 1s (Only for Skin Model, number is (offsetPartType8Unknown2 - offsetPartType8Unknown1)/0x20)
0x20320x00List Type 8 Unknown 2s (Only for Skin Model, number is the max Unknown 18 value in the Type 8 Unknown 1s)
0x20320x00List Mesh Data (One for each mesh (layer 1 + layer 2))

Model Type 2 (16Bit or Stitching Model only)

Length: 0x4/4

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44List non-indexed Mesh Data (

Model Entry

Length: 0x8/8

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44Model Offset (relative to model base position)
0x440x44Model Name Offset (relative to name base position)

Material

Length: 0x20/32

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44Flags
0x440x22Texture Index
0x660x11Unknown 6
0x770x11Anisotropy
0x880x44Zero (check bytes)
0xC120x22Unknown C
0xE140x22Material index check (must match actual material index, 0 based)
0x10160x44Unknown 10
0x14200x44Zero (check bytes)
0x18240x44Zero (check bytes)
0x1C280x44Zero (check bytes)

Transformation Matrix

Length: 0x30/48

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x3048A 3 x 4 (row major) matrix of 12 floats

Mesh Header

Length: 0x62/98

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44Render Flags(Unk01: 0x01; Two Sided: 0x02; Unk04: 0x04; Unk08: 0x08; Unk10: 0x10; Unk20: 0x20; Unk40; 0x40; Unk200: 0x200)
0x440x44Unknown 4
0x880x44Unknown 8
0xC120x44Unknown C
0x10160x44Unknown 10
0x14200x11Used Material Count
0x15210x11Section Flags (Transformation Matrix Ref: 0x1; Coordinates: 0x200; Normals: 0x400; Color: 0x800; Primary Texture Coordinates: 0x2000; Secondary Texture Coordinates: 0x4000; Tertiary Texture Coordinates: 0x8000; Unknown 5: 0x2000000)
0x16220x22Unknown 14
0x18240x22Primary Material Index
0x1A260x22Secondary Material Index
0x1C280x22Tertiary Material Index
0x1E300x44Vertex Flags
0x22340x88Transformation Matrix Specific Indexes Object 1 (8 separate bytes)
0x2A420x44Chunck 1 Size
0x2E460x44Chunck 2 Size
0x32500x44X Center for Bounding Sphere
0x36540x44X Center for Bounding Sphere
0x3A580x44X Center for Bounding Sphere
0x3E620x44Unknown 3C
0x42660x44Unknown 40
0x46700x44Zero (check bytes)
0x4A740x44Zero (check bytes)
0x4E780x44Zero (check bytes)
0x52820x44Zero (check bytes)
0x56860x44Zero (check bytes)
0x5A900x44Zero (check bytes)
0x5E940x44Zero (check bytes)

Vertex Pool (Indexed Data)

Length: 0x40/64

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44X Position
0x440x44Y Position
0x880x44Z Position
0xC120x44X Normal (Not always unit vector)
0x10160x44Y Normal (Not always unit vector)
0x14200x44Z Normal (Not always unit vector)
0x18240x44X Primary Texture Coordinate
0x1C280x44Y Primary Texture Coordinate
0x20320x44X Secondary Texture Coordinate
0x24360x44Y Secondary Texture Coordinate
0x28400x44X Tertiary Texture Coordinate
0x2C440x44Y Tertiary Texture Coordinate
0x30480x44Color Indexed Raw (Optionally checked for use)
0x34520x44Unknown 7_1
0x38560x44Unknown 7_2 (Only present when type is 8)
0x3C600x44Unknown 7_3 (Only present when type is 8

Type 8 Unknown 1 (Not in SMB?)

Length: 0x20/32

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44Unknown 0
0x440x44Unknown 4
0x880x44Unknown 8
0xC120x44Unknown C
0x10160x44Unknown 10
0x14200x44Unknown 14
0x18240x22Unknown 18
0x1A260x22Zero (check bytes)
0x1C280x44Unknown 1C

Type 8 Unknown 2 (Not in SMB?)

Length: 0x2/2

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x22Type 8 Unknown 2

Mesh Data (Indexed Data)

Length: 0x0/0

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x00List Chunk 1 Strip Header (Number of ints is Chunk 1 Size, only if mesh header has the 0x01 section flag set)
0x000x00List Chunk 2 Strip Header (Number of ints is Chunk 2 Size, only if mesh header has the 0x02 section flag set)

Strip Header (Indexed Data)

Length: 0x4/4

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44Strip Length
0x440x00List Strip Data (Number of bytes is strip length)

Strip Data (Indexed Data)

Length: 0x4/4

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44Vertex Offset (Must be a multiple of 0x40 and less than the vertex pool size)

Non-indexedMesh Data (Non-indexed Data)

Length: 0x18/24

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x00List Chunk 1 Strip Header (Non-indexed, Object 1 strips) (Number of ints is Chunk 1 Size, only if mesh header has the 0x01 section flag set)
0x000x00List Chunk 2 Strip Header (Non-indexed, Object 1 strips) (Number of ints is Chunk 2 Size, only if mesh header has the 0x02 section flag set)
0x000x44Chunk 3 Size (only if mesh header has the 0xFF section flag set)
0x440x44Chunk 4 Size (only if mesh header has the 0xFF section flag set)
0x880x44Zero (check bytes, only if mesh header has the 0xFF section flag set)
0xC120x44Zero (check bytes, only if mesh header has the 0xFF section flag set)
0x10160x44Zero (check bytes, only if mesh header has the 0xFF section flag set)
0x14200x44Zero (check bytes, only if mesh header has the 0xFF section flag set)
0x18240x00List Chunk 3 Strip Header (Non-indexed, Object 2 strips) (Number of ints is Chunk 3 Size, only if mesh header has the 0xFF section flag set)
0x18240x00List Chunk 4 Strip Header (Non-indexed, Object 2 strips) (Number of ints is Chunk 4 Size, only if mesh header has the 0xFF section flag set)

Strip Header (Non-indexed Data)

Length: 0x3/3

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x11Non-indexed Type Value (Must match Model Section flag type. 16Bit: 0x99; Float: 0x98)
0x110x22Number of vertices
0x330x00List Strip Data (Non-indexed) (Number vertices)

Strip Data (Non-indexed Data)

Length: 0x2D/45

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x44Vertex Offset (Must be a multiple of 0x40 and less than the vertex pool size)
0x440x11Transformation Matrix Ref (only if flagged)
0x550x00X Position (only if Coordinate enabled, can be float or 16Bit)
0x550x00Y Position (only if Coordinate enabled, can be float or 16Bit)
0x550x00Z Position (only if Coordinate enabled, can be float or 16Bit)
0x550x00X Normal (only if Normal enabled, can be float or 16Bit)
0x550x00Y Normal (only if Normal enabled, can be float or 16Bit)
0x550x00Z Normal (only if Normal enabled, can be float or 16Bit)
0x550x44RGBA Color (only if Color enabled)
0x990x00X Primary Texture Coordinate (only if primary texture enabled, can be float or 16Bit)
0x990x00Y Primary Texture Coordinate (only if primary texture enabled, can be float or 16Bit)
0x990x00X Secondary Texture Coordinate (only if secondary texture enabled, can be float or 16Bit)
0x990x00Y Secondary Texture Coordinate (only if secondary texture enabled, can be float or 16Bit)
0x990x00X Tertiary Texture Coordinate (only if tertiary texture enabled, can be float or 16Bit)
0x990x00Y Tertiary Texture Coordinate (only if tertiary texture enabled, can be float or 16Bit)
0x990x44Unknown 5_1 (only if Unknown 5 enabled, not sure if it has a type toggle)
0xD130x44Unknown 5_2 (only if Unknown 5 enabled, not sure if it has a type toggle)
0x11170x44Unknown 5_3 (only if Unknown 5 enabled, not sure if it has a type toggle)
0x15210x44Unknown 5_4 (only if Unknown 5 enabled, not sure if it has a type toggle)
0x19250x44Unknown 5_5 (only if Unknown 5 enabled, not sure if it has a type toggle)
0x1D290x44Unknown 5_6 (only if Unknown 5 enabled, not sure if it has a type toggle)
0x21330x44Unknown 5_7 (only if Unknown 5 enabled, not sure if it has a type toggle)
0x25370x44Unknown 5_8 (only if Unknown 5 enabled, not sure if it has a type toggle)
0x29410x44Unknown 5_9 (only if Unknown 5 enabled, not sure if it has a type toggle)
